dcterms:creator: Omar Moured
Jiaming Zhang
Alina Roitberg
Thorsten Schwarz
Rainer Stiefelhagen
dcterms:description: The Line Graphics (LG) dataset includes pixel-wise annotations of 5 coarse and 10 fine-grained categories, covering 520 images of mathematical graphics collected from 450 documents across various disciplines.
dcterms:title: Line Graphics (LG) dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Clark
S. Divvala
dcterms:description: PDFFigures 2.0 is a dataset that provides bounding box annotations for captions, figures, and tables extracted from a random sample of research papers.
dcterms:title: PDFFigures 2.0

dcterms:creator: J. Poco
J. Heer
dcterms:description: The Poco et al. dataset consists of automatically generated and manually annotated charts from various sources, including bounding boxes and transcribed content of text elements.
dcterms:title: Poco et al.

dcterms:creator: W. Dai
M. Wang
Z. Niu
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: The Dai et al. dataset is a benchmark for extracting textual and numeric information from bar charts, including both web-collected and synthetic charts.
dcterms:title: Dai et al.

dcterms:creator: K. Jobin
A. Mondal
C. Jawahar
dcterms:description: DocFigure is a dataset for scientific document figure classification, consisting of 33,000 annotated figures from various categories found in scientific articles.
dcterms:title: DocFigure

dcterms:creator: K. Davila
B. U. Kota
S. Setlur
V. Govindaraju
C. Tensmeyer
S. Shekhar
R. Chaudhry
dcterms:description: The ICDAR Charts 2019 dataset was created for a competition focusing on automatic chart recognition, including tasks like image classification and text detection.
dcterms:title: ICDAR Charts 2019
